snippet.title: Theme Park World | Theme Park Roller Coaster - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Footage taken directly from the original PlayStation 2 console using an HDMI converter.

Since the original PC version is incompatible with modern Windows computers (unless you go through all the trouble applying the patches to fix that), as well as the fact the game hadn't been fixed up and re-released on GOG.com, the closest we can get to play Theme Park World is through its home console counterparts that were developed by Climax Development.
While the PAL and Japanese versions refer to this game as Theme Park World, the US version calls the PC and PSone versions as SimTheme Park, while the PlayStation 2 version in America was known as Theme Park Rollercoaster.

This video you see here is for the PAL version of the PlayStation 2 port.

Theme Park, SimTheme Park, Theme Park World, Theme Park Rollercoaster (C) Electronic Arts
Also released on: PC, PSone

#themepark #themeparkrollercoaster #simthemepark #themeparkworld #ea #bullfrog #electronicarts #ps2 #playstation2 #eagames #electronicartsgames #retrogames #retrogaming
